ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What a moo-ving picture...but you know, cows are black with white spots. Robynn, at school and suffering her way through the last week of classes and on
ygData.messageBody:
> Llamas?! Cuidado Llamas!
>
> Umm, isn't this considered off-topic now or is this actually valid bard
> information? Not that I mind, I need some stress relief and this is helping
> to provide it by being a change from the depression of bard nerfs and
> inferiority of bard-only stuff. =)
>
> Now Bard only cow-armor (white with black spots and an udder) would be cool.
> Or maybe not. Umm, nevermind.
>
> ---Windleaf, 23rd level Bard on Bertox

What a moo-ving picture...but you know, cows are black with white
spots.

Robynn, at school and suffering her way through the last week of
classes and on towards finals week.

--
Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
katyw@... you really mean it.
